DOC.brief_summary: To compare conventional polyglactin 910 sutures with triclosan-coated polyglactin 910 antimicrobial sutures for the reduction of surgical site infections and any associated health and economic benefits.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of Using Triclosan-antibacterial Sutures on the Incidence of Surgical Site Infection
DOC.criteria: All patients of different age Gender Risk factors and procedures candidate for surgical intervention during the period of the study Patients with an established preoperative infection at the operative site
